insights.title: Excellent Security Posture
insights.description: HTTPS everywhere, valid SSL, and security headers signal trustworthiness to AI.

insights.title: Clear Business Entity
insights.description: Complete contact info, business registration, and physical address verify legitimacy.

insights.title: Missing Privacy Policy Updates
insights.description: Privacy policy hasn't been updated since 2022, raising compliance questions.

issues.impact: Raises compliance questions for AI trust evaluation
Customer testimonials lack structured data markup
Missing correction policy for content sites

recommendations.title: Update Legal Pages
recommendations.action: Refresh privacy policy and terms of service with current dates and regulations.

recommendations.title: Add Review Schema
recommendations.action: Implement AggregateRating and Review structured data for testimonials.

recommendations.title: Create Editorial Guidelines
recommendations.action: Publish transparent editorial and correction policies.
